appBackground.helpText: Ratio: 10:16. Will be displayed using the app or webapp on a smarthpone in portrait mode.

appLauncherIcon.helpText: Has to be an .SVG vector graphic AND the ratio must be 1:1. Will be displayed on your phones home screen to launch your app

appPcBackground.helpText: Will be displayed in the webapp using a pc

appSplashscreen.helpText: Will be displayed during app startup

logo.helpText: Will be displayed on the apps main page

fundingPartner1.helpText: Will be displayed in the funding partner sections

fundingPartner2.helpText: Will be displayed in the funding partner sections

fundingPartner3.helpText: Will be displayed in the funding partner sections

appSources.helpText: Sources you used to build this app.
